name: Teacher Kiki Chinese Learning Centre and Student Care

reviews.text:
While we were staying in the neighbourhood, our boy was enrolled at Teacher Kiki's as one of the pioneering batches. Teacher Kiki is very kind, patient and encouraging.

She always has these personal touches to make her classes interesting. Thank you Kiki for embarking ZY on his chinese enrichment.

My primary schooler has been going to Teacher Kiki's for about 2+ years. He enjoys the lessons and improved his Chinese, especially composition by quite a bit. Sometimes he surprises me with Chinese expressions that he has learned from Teacher Kiki. If you are looking for a small size class for your child, and a teacher who cares for each student, this place should be one of your considerations. üëç

My child is constantly encouraged and motivated there to do her best for CL composition writing, resulting in getting good results for her preliminary exam. Thank you ÂÖ∂Áê™ËÄÅÂ∏à for instilling confidence in my child!

We made the right choice to put our kid to Teacher Kiki since K1 level. The teachers are very attentive to the progress and keep us updated about how our kid is progessing.
From having a difficulty on Mandarin, our kid was quickly pick it up once she joined this centre. It was such a relieve since both of us coud not teach her Mandarin. Our kid has been doing great in school until now.
We definitely recommend this learning centre to other parents, the centre puts effort towards their students. We can‚Äôt thank them enoughy for our kid‚Äôs progress in Mandarin.

In my son‚Äôs words: ‚ÄúTeacher Kiki is kind, patient and makes the lessons fun and interesting at the same time.‚Äù My son‚Äôs mandarin improved since going to teacher Kiki. Her materials are very good too. Would recommend
